availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: The military recruiting district organized by the Enrollment Act of 1863 and aligned with the 8th Congressional District of Kentucky. Comprised of the following counties in 1863: Garrard, Madison, Estill, Wolfe, Rockastle, Jackson, Owsley, Breathitt, Pulaski, Laurel, Clay, Perry, Wayne, Whitley, Knox, Harlan, Letcher. Provost Marshal(s): Captain Robert Hays.

ab.bibl: The Army & Navy Official Gazette vol. II, 1864-65, No. 36 (Washington, D.C.: Office of F. & J. Rives, 1865), 570-572; See also CWGK Congressional District Maps under Reference tab.
